#summary How to use the generic format.

= Introduction =

whatswrong provides a generic format that you can use to visualize data even if it is not
in one of the existing formats. 


= Format =

{{{
>>
>Word
0 "The"
1 "man"
2 "likes"
3 "football"
4 "."

>Mentions
0  1  "Person"
3  3  "Concept"

>Relations
2  1  "Agent"
2  3  "Theme"

}}}
